Start: ^The player walks into the cafe area for some breakfest. early in the morning
^I head over to the cafe for some breakfest. I could use the meal.
^I spot Max doing their daily mopping.
^they're as carefree as ever doing that, and only notice me as I start to sit down with my meal.

b: ^, didn't I tell ya to go to bed?"
^I shrug. I'm not that fatigued. at least, I won't be after I eat.
^[Max] "Well, If you say so. You still shouldn't be staying up so late."
^[Max] "That's good. Eduardo's a good guy, but he underestimates how easily he can influence people."

Start: ^Max starts to go back to their mopping, when Timothy run's into the room.
^He looks happy, but also nervous. wonder what's up?
^[Timothy] "Oh, I'm just got up all bright and early, like you asked!"
^"Y'know, I'm really glad your adjusting here nicely."
^Max is proud, and gives some wisdom on self motivation.
^Max then leaves, and timothy deflates. he goes to get some breakfest.
^you can then decide if you want to give timothy some space, or go eat with him.

c: ^You decide to give timothy some space.
^You eat in quiet comfort. Fatigue and Stress reduced
^You move your food over to near Timothy, and chat with him.
^you have a nice simple conversation with him. expression, grace, and awareness all increase!
